text: Our Billing and Licensing Team is currently experiencing a high volume of calls and tickets. This may result in longer response times, but we commit to prioritizing critical requests and resolving your question as soon as possible. In the meantime, we invite you to have a look at our FAQ page. Appreciate your patience!
